Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Izhar (יִצְהָר) descendant of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► opponent of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) ancestor of Korahite (קָרְחִי) clan
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= causative action by which someone strikes the palms of their hands together ► in joy

Node.gloss: to clap (one's) hands (for joy or glee)
Node.definition: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = to strike the palms of one's hands together ≈ as a symbol of joy and appreciation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= an epithet for the God of Israel ◄ as the one who not only lives in the highest heavens but is also worthy of the highest honor
= state in which humans, deities, places and activities have qualities that inspire fear in others
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action or process by which a nation gains control over someone else, usually involving violence
= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

= the meaning of this word is uncertain and can only be deduced from its etymology; possible interpretations include: a song that shows understanding, by which the understanding either refers to the structure or to the contents of this song; or: a song that gives understanding; or: a meditation

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
= large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= member of the nobility; ≈ associated with authority; expected to be generous, reliable, and just
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to come up; hence: = process by which humans or deities increase in status and importance
